divs: Sighting Details i was driving on my way home traveling northbound on i-5 it was 8:15pm on the 12th day of august 2009 when i noticed a object hovering in the sky it had 3 huge bright white lights on the bottom in the middle of the craft.it was moving from northwest to southeast very slowly above the freeway about 100-120 feet off the ground i was checking it out while i was moving closer to it thought it to be a bit strange .it had no blinking lights and it was huge i believe it to be around 200ft long black in color it had a shape of a triangle i was excited, went to pull over and when i stopped the car it was gone i was surprized no one else stoped to check it out also ..thats my brief encounter
Summary: Interstate-5 Woodburn, Oregon 3 huge bright lights moved slowly over freeway.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Woodburn
There was one other sighting in Woodburn on or around August 12th 2009
